member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.WebRequestExtensions.DownloadFile(System.Net.HttpWebRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads a file via HTTP using the web proxy defined in , and the default chunk size defined in
member.param: The full path and file name of the target file
member.remarks: This overload is not suitable for FTP transfers as it does not support credentials

member.param: The full path and file name of the target file
The method to handle file progress events
member.remarks: This overload is not suitable for FTP transfers as it does not support credentials

member.summary: Rounds the supplied decimal to the specified amount of decimal points
member.param: The number of decimal points to round the output value to

member.name: T:Componax.ExtensionMethods.CryptoHelpers
member.summary: Contains helper methods for working woth cryptography

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.CryptoHelpers.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts specified plaintext using Rijndael symmetric key algorithm and returns a base64-encoded result.
member.param: Passphrase from which a pseudo-random password will be derived. The derived password will be used to generate the encryption key. Passphrase can be any string. In this example we assume that this passphrase is an ASCII string.
Salt value used along with passphrase to generate password. Salt can be any string. In this example we assume that salt is an ASCII string.
Hash algorithm used to generate password. Allowed values are: "MD5" and "SHA1". SHA1 hashes are a bit slower, but more secure than MD5 hashes.
Number of iterations used to generate password. One or two iterations should be enough.
Initialization vector (or IV). This value is required to encrypt the first block of plaintext data. For RijndaelManaged class IV must be exactly 16 ASCII characters long.
Size of encryption key in bits. Allowed values are: 128, 192, and 256. Longer keys are more secure than shorter keys.
member.returns: Encrypted value formatted as a base64-encoded string.

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.CryptoHelpers.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts specified ciphertext using Rijndael symmetric key algorithm.
member.param: Passphrase from which a pseudo-random password will be derived. The derived password will be used to generate the encryption key. Passphrase can be any string. In this example we assume that this passphrase is an ASCII string.
Salt value used along with passphrase to generate password. Salt can be any string. In this example we assume that salt is an ASCII string.
Hash algorithm used to generate password. Allowed values are: "MD5" and "SHA1". SHA1 hashes are a bit slower, but more secure than MD5 hashes.
Number of iterations used to generate password. One or two iterations should be enough.
Initialization vector (or IV). This value is required to encrypt the first block of plaintext data. For RijndaelManaged class IV must be exactly 16 ASCII characters long.
Size of encryption key in bits. Allowed values are: 128, 192, and 256. Longer keys are more secure than shorter keys.
member.remarks: Most of the logic in this function is similar to the Encrypt logic. In order for decryption to work, all parameters of this function - except cipherText value - must match the corresponding parameters of the Encrypt function which was called to generate the ciphertext.

member.summary: Remove accent from strings

member.name: T:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings
member.summary: Contains global variables used in the Componax.ExtensionMethods library

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes a static instance of the ExtensionMethodsSettings class

member.name: P:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.DefaultEncoding
member.summary: Gets or Sets the default encoding scheme extension methods should use
member.remarks: The default value for this property is

member.name: P:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.DefaultCulture
member.summary: Gets or Sets the default culture information extension methods should use
member.remarks: The default value for this property is

member.name: P:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.DefaultBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or Sets the default buffer size (in bytes) used for streaming operations
member.remarks: The default value for this property is 4096 bytes

member.name: P:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.DefaultWebProxy
member.summary: Gets or Sets the default web proxy to use for net based operations
member.remarks: The defalt value for this property is null

member.name: P:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.ByteFormats
member.summary: Gets or Sets the classifiers for Bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB, PB, and EB
member.remarks: The strings in this array are used to format byte counts for the WebRequestExtensions methods. The values should reflect 1024 ^ n increments, starting with "Bytes", then onto "Megabytes", "Gigabytes", "Terabytes", etc.

member.name: P:Componax.ExtensionMethods.ExtensionMethodsSettings.MimeTypes
member.summary: Gets or Sets a list of standard mime types for common file extensions
member.remarks: The key is the raw extension in lower case, including prefix period (e.g. '.pdf', '.txt')

member.name: T:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeTypeHelper
member.summary: Contains helper methods for determining the MIME type of a file

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeTypeHelper.FindMimeFromData(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.IntPtr@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the MIME type from the data provided.
member.param: A pointer to the IBindCtx interface. Can be set to NULL.
A pointer to a string value that contains the URL of the data. Can be set to NULL if pBuffer contains the data to be sniffed.
A pointer to the buffer that contains the data to be sniffed. Can be set to NULL if pwzUrl contains a valid URL.
An unsigned long integer value that contains the size of the buffer.
A pointer to a string value that contains the proposed MIME type. This value is authoritative if nothing else can be determined about type. Can be set to NULL.

One of the following required values: FMFD_DEFAULT No flags specified. Use default behavior for the function. FMFD_URLASFILENAME Treat the specified pwzUrl as a file name. FMFD_ENABLEMIMESNIFFING Use MIME-type detection even if FEATURE_MIME_SNIFFING is detected. Usually, this feature control key would disable MIME-type detection. FMFD_IGNOREMIMETEXTPLAIN Perform MIME-type detection if "text/plain" is proposed, even if data sniffing is otherwise disabled. FMFD_SERVERMIME
The address of a string value that receives the suggested MIME type.
member.returns: Returns one of the following values: S_OK The operation completed successfully. E_FAIL The operation failed. E_INVALIDARG One or more arguments are invalid. E_OUTOFMEMORY There is insufficient memory to complete the operation.

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeTypeHelper.FindMimeType(System.String,Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeHelperType)
member.summary: Finds the MIME type for a file using the specified helper type
member.param: The full path and file name of the file to scan
The helper type used to determine the MIME type
member.returns: A string representing the file MIME type

list.item: If using the actual file represented by the the fileName attribute must exist and be readable by this code. Note that this method has the benefit of not relying on an accurate file extension, as the MIME type is determined from the first 256 bytes of the file itself.

If using , the file does not need to exist, but this code must have access to the system registry. Use with caution within ASP.Net. Also note that the registry method can only return the MIME types for file extensions that have been registered on the executing machine, i.e. PDF will only work if Adobe Acrobat has been installed.
If using the file does not need to exist, and no special code permissions will be required.

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeTypeHelper.FindMimeTypeFromFileData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Scans the first 256 bytes of the specified file then uses a P/Invoke call to urlmon.dll to determine the MIME type
member.param: The full path and name of the file to scan
(Optional) The proposed MIME type of the file
member.returns: A string representing the file MIME type

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeTypeHelper.FindMimeTypeFromRegistry(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to get the MIME type for a file from the system registry, based on it's registered extension details.
member.param: The name of the file to process. Full path info is not required as all we're really using is the extension.
member.returns: A string representing the file MIME type

member.name: M:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeTypeHelper.FindMimeTypeFromList(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to get the MIME type for a file from the list of MIME types contained in
member.param: The name of the file to process. Full path info is not required as all we're really using is the extension.
member.returns: A string representing the file MIME type
member.remarks: contains info for only the most common of file types, so you may want to extend the list to support more specialized file extensions/MIME types.

member.name: T:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeHelperType
member.summary: Specifies the method to use when trying to automatically determine the MIME type of a file

member.name: F:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeHelperType.List
member.summary: Determine the MIME type from the list of file extensions in

member.name: F:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeHelperType.Registry
member.summary: Determine the MIME type using the system registry

member.name: F:Componax.ExtensionMethods.MimeHelperType.FileData
member.summary: Determine the MIME type using a P/Invoke call to urlmon.dll, passing the first 256 bytes of file data

members.member: Copies all files from one directory to another.
